name: Wall Runner Ultimate (v1.1)
description:
Wall running? That's what you're all about. You don't care about gravity, pointy spikes, or death lasers?!  Pssh, as long as there are coins to collect, you're there. Use the mouse (or space/Z keys) to flip and move your character …How far can you get? 

- Check out the settings in the main menu, there you can switch to mobile mode, toggle music, effects and more!

CREDITS:

art: mushy

graphic designer: YUJI

animation: mushy

code: KLOVATER with Warfame

text code: KLOVATER
